argument.description: An expression that returns a value of any built-in numeric data type.
An expression that returns a string, including FOR BIT DATA, that represents a number.

description: The DOUBLE_PRECISION and DOUBLE functions return a double-precision floating-point representation of either a number or a string representation of a number.
sample:
SELECT EMPNO, DOUBLE(SALARY)/COMM
     FROM EMPLOYEE
     WHERE COMM > 0
